title: [Grawood Farmstead, Meadow]
description: A mesh of hemp twine strung between a series of stout posts supports a vibrant green vine bearing clusters of dark red grapes.  Though small, the grapes are plentiful and plump, ripe for the picking.  Beneath the canopy of leaves, a silvered statue is set on a stone base.
room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
